new-device-defaults.title: new device defaults
new-device-defaults.description: Select what should happen when new devices are added to Homey.

homekit-pairing.title: homekit pairing
homekit-pairing.description: Pairing code to add HomeKitty to the Home app.

devices.description: Select which devices should be appear in HomeKit.

identifier.title: Bridge Identifier
identifier.description: Change the bridge identifier if you have multiple Homeys in your network. Each Homey should have a unique identifier.
identifier.restart-app: Bridge identifier has been changed, a restart of the HomeKitty app is now required.

reset.description: If you have problems trying to add Homey to HomeKit (e.g. if HomeKit can't find the HomeKitty bridge), you can perform a full reset.
reset.restart-app: HomeKitty has been reset, a restart of the HomeKitty app is now required.
